messages.subject: Atlanta unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 3:47:30 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 3:47:30 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Just curious is
anyone else from Atlanta planning to attend the conference this
weekend? Also am I the only one attending with dh and preschoolers? >>

There is a support group in Atlanta, I will email someone and have them get
back to you. I am going right through Atlanta on my way to the
conference...someone in Canton offered to have me stay the night there on the
10th (on my way up) and the 15th (on my way home). It's a little out of the
way, but I can't do the whole drive in one day.
I will write them and find out who you should contact!!! Cool.

Ren
